sense.def:
Kadar človek
mentions something
, o nečem nekaj reče, ponavadi na kratko.

seg.quote: Penny decided not to mention her cold.
I mentioned to Tom that I was thinking of going back to work.

sense.def:
A mention
je omemba nečesa ali nekoga.

seg.quote: My brother used to go purple in the face at the very mention of my name.

sense.def:
Izraz
not to mention
uporabljamo, kadar nekemu seznamu poudarjeno dodamo še nekaj.

seg.quote: He's always travelling to Buenos Aires and Delhi, not to mention London and Paris.
